website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option that doubles as a tent.
pros: Tent provides shaded outdoor ball pit fun
Breathable mesh sides allows for air circulation and visibility
Pop-up design is quick and easy to assemble/dissemble
Offers little ones a novel yet safe “hideaway” ball pit experience

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper material than other sellers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this originally from another seller 2 years ago, and after rough use from my toddler, it was still in good shape, with minor ripping at the corners exposing the wire frame a tiny bit, but superficial. Only replaced it because he got sick and threw up all over it. This is the same exact model tent as that one but for some reason this version is more plastic-y material, to the touch and sound wise. Our original one was more tent like canvas material. Same pricing so not sure why. I will update my review once it gets good heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer0418

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it--highly recommend for litter tracking
customer_reviews.text: Cat lady review... I bought this to house one of my cats' litter boxes as I have an older cat who gleefully tosses litter around and I was sick of stepping on it. I thought the high entrance would stop most of the litter from getting tracked through my house, and I was right! Not only has using this tent around the box solved that problem for me, the cats love to play through the screen window sides and dive at each other through them. Getting this was maybe my best idea of the year for cat innovation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This tent has been so much fun! We have a small house and it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent has been so much fun! We have a small house and it doesn't really take up as much space as you would think. We put all a lot of his toys in with all the balls so that the house stays neater and he has somewhere to "hang out" and play. The balls have been our entertainment for the past few months and my son is about to be one. I used 200 balls and that filled it enough for my little guy. I would recommend more to make it more like a ball pit. You have to buy the balls separately though. But I would definitely recommend this product for months, maybe years, of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, but no balls.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat's 4th birthday. The add looks like the balls are included, but they're not (hence the lack of a fifth star). However, it's roomy enough that I was able to put one of my furbabies' couches right inside to cozy it up! Also, it's tall enough that I can actually crawl inside and sit on the couch with them. (Yes, I've done so. I'm a very attentive cat mama. Don't judge.) I'm sure human children would love it, too! Just don't forget your balls.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: Small colorful tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my grandson. I ordered one bag of 100 balls for the tent and they barely filled up the bottom. I will be ordering another three bags of balls to get the ball pit effect. Happy with the purchase my grandson is still too young to understand how to play with his tent but overall happy with my purchase. Small in size fits perfect in the corner of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: MelGJ

customer_reviews.title: Light tent. Perfect for toddlers to carry around the house.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old so she can play in it with some balls along with her toys. She loves it. It's light enough for her to carry around the house and it's the perfect size; not too big and not too small. The material isn't the strongest but it's good for the price. I love the zipper bag that came with it. Makes it easy to pack and carry wherever we want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dandoon

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This item was bigger than I thought it would be, and 100 balls barely covers the bottom of the floor, which also surprised me. But, I think it's a great purchase for my 1 year old granddaughter that is in love with playing with those colorful plastic balls. Its also a good way to keep them all contained to one area when she's not at my house, easy to move, and it's fun for her to play clean up cause she can throw them in the doorway of the tent. Love the color of it, and that you can see in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Burks

customer_reviews.title: so far alright
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday to give to my daughter for her birthday. My daughter use to have a play tent very similar to the that over the years of heavy and regular use became worn and tore. i was excited to find this tent as it exactly the same style of her old one. Unfortunately the first thing i noticed is that the polyester type material that it is made out of is very thin and feels brittle and cheap. ill update my star rating to reflect its performance but i do not expect it to last any where near as long as her old tent.
customer_reviews.author: SkyeAlysa

customer_reviews.title: He LOVED it and mom and dad were happy that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 1 year old nephew. He LOVED it and mom and dad were happy that the balls were somewhat contained and that the tent could easily fold down for storage. Did I mention the grandparents had just as much fun sitting in the doorway of the tent and playing, too? Buy 200 or 250 balls - it'll look empty with much less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this but not as much as me.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this but not as much as me. My wife and I were looking for a way to keep our son from wanting to explore climbing on the couches, so far this seems to be able to keep him distracted. Good breathable quality fabric. Durable seams and wire frame. I also like how this came with a bag for portable storage. It folds right up into a small circle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for young child
customer_reviews.text: My niece is OBSESSED with this tent. We havent purchased the balls to go with it yet but she plays hide and seek with it and hides in it to look at her books! Shes a larger 1 year old and it is a perfect size! I feel like she could grow into it for the next few years!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Nolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent for 2years boy
customer_reviews.text: Superb ...,nice play tent for my boy Everything is in good condition & looking cute Perfect size for 2years boy .quality also good,nice color.cheap& best..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This shipped in less than a week. Way before it said it would be here. I bought this for my niece for her 1st birthday and plan on buying more for my older nieces and nephews! It's pretty big! Really surprised me! And it fold up really small! Will update!
customer_reviews.author: clara

customer_reviews.title: Kids play tent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and as advertised . Easy to open package and nice carry bag. Simple to setup . Bought for one year old grand child, added 200 pit balls . Really worth it for the grand child. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ocfive

customer_reviews.title: Great with 400 balls
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this with 400 balls. 1 yr old and 3 yr old. And the tent keeps the balls inside better than just a round tub type container.
customer_reviews.author: JWHHC

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Great smaller size, holds up to my 2 year old. Very flexible. Mesh windows are nice for seeing in or through the tent. The mesh sides can be easily snagged by velcro, etc. but has remained in tact through the snags. UPDATE: The fabric around the base of the tent has begun ripping. This is a great product but doesn't hold up to a toddler for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could use small modification
customer_reviews.text: Good product but wish it had a zipper to close or at least velcro on the bottom portion. We bought 800 balls and some spill out because of the gaps when the flap is closed. Again, wish it had velcro at the bottom portion of flap but good for the price. My kid loves it. Spacious too.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeBoy91

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my daughter's first birthday. ALL the kids loved it. I filled it with
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Much happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this after buying 3 inflatable ball pits that ripped in areas that were "unpatchable". My daughter has yet to destroy this one yet. Fingers crossed. It fits A LOT of balls as well. Much happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a present for my Neice and she LOVES it. High quality outer materials and high quality balls internally. She absolutely loves it and will not get out of it. Great present or toy for children 4 and younger. I don't think it would fit a child much older than that. It was her favorite toy and she loves to sit in there and watch TV all day. If you are gift shopping, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: The kids had so much fun playing in this! I ordered the pack of 200 balls and it covered the bottom of the pit well and provided a lot of fun for a 1.5 year old little girl and a 2.5 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take out and put away, good size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pop open, easy to fold. I bought this for my nephew with 500 balls. He flung himself in and started "swimming." He also loves throwing the balls everywhere. My nephew loves it, my brother hates it, so it's an all around win!
customer_reviews.author: cameralinz

customer_reviews.title: Great great
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. It is easy to clean, easy to fold up, and works great as a ball pit. Two of the sides have mesh the whole side, so the kid inside can see out. Really great!
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: its really fun
customer_reviews.text: The pro’s are that its really fun, cozy and keeps my toddler occupied for hours. He calls it his “house”! I can easily fold it and put it out of the way when I want to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for a ball pit!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My daughter loves this! I like that it comes with a little case, so when I want to put it away, I just fold it down and place in the bag until the next time we want it out. Two of the sides are see-through, so it doesn't feel too cave like for little ones who are just exploring.
customer_reviews.author: Cin_In_FL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson loves this Update 2+ years later. My now 3 year old grandson still loves this tent. He has put it through everything and it is still working well. His 8 months old brother has now joined him and they both love playing in it and rolling around in it. With what my grandson has put this cute little tent through I can’t believe it’s still in good shape. 5+++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for toodlers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece and nephew who are toddlers under 3. It’s durable for the both of them to fit in and play. They’ve turn it into the campsite while they watch cartoons with their blankies and stuffed animals. Wet sturdy and easy enough for them to take out and set up. It’s still standing the test of time - so that’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter (one and a half) loves her tent. ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter (one and a half) loves her tent. She sometimes struggles stepping over the lip to get in, but loves going in and out and throwing the balls around and sticking her face against the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this tent! It’s so easy to set up and put away! It folds up nicely and can be stored away after each use so it doesn’t take up floor space permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore4

customer_reviews.title: Balls of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, you need at least 200 to 300 balls to fill it enough for them to swim/half jump in it. On the plus side it has a door that can be rolled up or left down so if someone is showing up unexpected you can throw alot of toys inside and let the door down!!!! LOL had to throw a plus in there for the moms!
customer_reviews.author: Sdarnell

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: It seem sturdy enough, it just move around a lot when the kids starting to move while inside so i have to take it back to the place where I want it to be. We bought 300 balls, but I think 200 is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Good for inside use
customer_reviews.text: It is small, but for a 2 year old is a good size. Nylon material can rip. I got this particular tent because it keeps the balls inside with the door being higher.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondack Original

customer_reviews.title: Finally figured it out had a good laugh. Anyway this little tent is going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my grandson. Unfolded it the day I got it. Did not pay attention as to how it was folded so saying that I couldn't figure how to fold it back. Finally figured it out had a good laugh. Anyway this little tent is going to be awesome with the 100 balls I got to go in it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Flimsy. But stores easily. Fits MAYBE 2 toddlers. Or a small toddler and a older kid
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A good ball bit that babies and Toddlers would enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My 18-month old loves this. I bought PowerTRC Play Balls for this which came in packs of 100. It's a pretty durable tent that is easy for babies and toddlers to crawl and walk into. It can probably hold about 300-400 balls before they would begin to fall out the front of it. I'll be buying more balls in order to get the ball pit effect. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but fragile fabric
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this tent as a ball pit however the first one I ordered lasted 5 weeks before it tore. I decided to try once more but we can’t even use it because it smells like it’s been covered in a terrible perfume. My kid can not do any type of scent due to a rare disease so we had to get it out of the house immediately.
customer_reviews.author: maressa

customer_reviews.title: I recommend ordering at least 300 balls if you order this ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little 2 year old granddaughter loves this play tent. I was surprised how little the 100 balls I ordered filled up the bottom of the tent, however. I recommend ordering at least 300 balls if you order this tent. the balls are very colorful and a good way to teach "colors."
customer_reviews.author: Liz Patten

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery. I like that this tent can collapse and it also came with a storage bag. Went up very easily and my son is having so much fun! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a inflatable tent.
customer_reviews.text: A tent full of balls. What could be more fun? Our daughters enjoy it. My only issue with it is that the entrance tore easily. It's not unexpected with little ones going in and out. This was better than an inflatable one which tore and deflated on the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Richley

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my 1.5 year old. We had an inflatable ball pit that tore after 1 day. This pop up one seems decent but it is flimsy. Theres no way it will fit back in the carrying case. Doesn't come with any directions on how to get it back in case and doesn't come with any papers in general including return papers. Hoping this holds up and lasts us a while. There is a small barely noticeable tear on the mesh but it's probably not even worth trying to get it back in the carrying case and figuring out how to return.
customer_reviews.author: claudia prislan

customer_reviews.title: Came in handy !
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it ! Bought this for him when he was a little under one. He’s almost three and still love it so much !
customer_reviews.author: Bubs18

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: That toy has become a child's secret garden, as long as put some toys to play in it will stay for the first half of the day, very suitable for children, the only bad thing is too small, only a child!
customer_reviews.author: xiaoyingwu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open up
customer_reviews.text: Fun place for kids to play in. Nice size, not to large.
customer_reviews.author: vwstu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tent along with 200 balls to keep my 1 year old and 2 year old grandsons busy during a weekend visit. The tent was a huge hit, they could both play in at the same time and had a blast climbing in and out. It folds up to a very small size, I found a video on youtube showing exactly how to fold it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My ferrets love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little larger than my needs but totally collapsible. Best money I've spent in a while keeping my old boy Happy 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no instructions so it is a little annoying to put back in the case when you want ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price, no instructions so it is a little annoying to put back in the case when you want to fold it up. I just kind of bend and twist until it squashes into the right shape.
customer_reviews.author: Adam d

customer_reviews.title: glad I didn't because 2 years later my son still ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ages ago and didn't leave a review....glad I didn't because 2 years later my son still loves this thing! Now that is a good investment and good testimonial to its usefulness!
customer_reviews.author: amy2115

customer_reviews.title: Good tent. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put up and easy to take down! It's a good tent in my opinion and my toddler daughter loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy kids are a little rough but the flap already tore after a week or two but everything else was good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product , but should say that the balls were not included.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Pena

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s decent. The mesh on the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s decent. The mesh on the sides is poorly constructed & is ripped. We use it as a ball pit so it serves its purpose just doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Ball pit
customer_reviews.text: Really cute we bought for our granddaughter. We also bought 200 balls for the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great for littles!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1.5 y/o son, we had 400 balls and he loves playing peekaboo in it!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Fun Ball Pit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 14 month old boy. Easy to put up (not so easy to return to original shape) but just the right size for a little guy and his room. Not too big...I think it would be a good fit for a grandparent also.
customer_reviews.author: NANA

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it’s super cheap material! I wouldn’t buy it again and will be returning if it doesn’t hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Cassaundra Melgar-C'De Baca

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old's room, as a ball pit. It came with runs/tears in the material. It is very flimsy/thin and will tear easily, seeing as how it came with tears in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks as shown very flexible. My son loves it. Nice and easy to store away
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to pop up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to pop up! Once you get the hand of it closing, it’s easy. Stores in bag easily and great to store in car. Play tent for camping, sunshade at beach and great reading/activity spot indoor & outdoor
customer_reviews.author: Roadtripn42

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: it did not hold up everytime the 2 year old would play in balls the sideas would rip finally i had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl zook

customer_reviews.title: we actually used it as a tent for the baby and it was great to keep her out the sun
customer_reviews.text: Needs a lot of balls to fill it since it's larger, we actually used it as a tent for the baby and it was great to keep her out the sun
customer_reviews.author: Aimi whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and lots of fun for kids less than 5 years old
customer_reviews.text: Took a beating at a children's party and came out unscathed!
customer_reviews.author: Picky buyer

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out on this - it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this - it is a little flimsier than I thought it would be. It may work but I'm not totally convinced yet.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this tent for 2 years and it’s durability is great. Just bought this 2nd one as a gift. I love how easy it folds up for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Fun birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My one year old niece loves this product. It was such a great choice for her first birthday. My sister in law also loved it and said she might crawl in it when she's had a bad day at work. Such a fun item.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Small compact and lightweight. Perfect size. Bought one for my grandsons first birthday and he LOVES IT. It’s become his safe place to go to play, sleep, and get away I’m now his favorite Mimi. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tami petersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 18 month old. Love that it can fold up and be stored in a small carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: MD1985

customer_reviews.title: This is such a versatile play tent/ball pit!. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a versatile play tent/ball pit!. We bought it as a gift for a one year old and she absolutely loves it! Definitely will be purchasing another one for our baby once he is old enough.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It ripped on the first day. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Gager

customer_reviews.title: Makes for the perfect ball pit
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old loves it! Prior to this, he got an inflatable ball pit for his birthday. It popped and we had to run and buy another. When the second one popped, I know I needed something that wasn’t inflatable. This is the perfect choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Campos

customer_reviews.title: Bday gift
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old loves his ball pit tent. So far has held up very well. I recommend you buy 100 balls we bought just 50 and it was quite enough. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new tent. It's the perfect size and very convenient since it's collapsible. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There’s a tear out side the tent on th Sean. I just open it. I want a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jen T.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Falls over pretty easily so be careful if not alot of balls inside
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so does my kid
customer_reviews.text: Love it and so does my kid. This tent requires at least 300 balls (it will be barely 2 rows up) to simulate a "ball pit". A 100 balls will look very sad and not even cover the floor. Tip: don't put this tent near walls or place pillows/blankets between the tent and walls - if a kid jumps in (inevitable) they will hit anything within 2ft.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Utz

customer_reviews.title: the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice smaller sized than some of others (perfect for us not having too much space) but holds plenty of balls the little ones LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Fun Tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my one year old. It was definitely worth my money, especially after seeing the prices at other stores for the same tent. It's very light and it's easy to pop up. It fits a lot of balls and my son likes to bring his books inside to read. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars because it doesn't fold down as quickly as it opens. I would still recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: The tent popped up easily and is adorable
customer_reviews.text: The tent popped up easily and is adorable. I wish it were more clear that balls are sold separately, but that's my fault for not reading the fine print.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy balls separately.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Godson and he loves it. I was just disappointed that it doesn't come with balls you have to buy to to them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this little tent and all the balls ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this little tent and all the balls. We ordered an extra 100 balls and she has a blast playing in her own little space.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Walker

customer_reviews.title: this is very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is very nice for the price. high enough balls will stay in it. nice mesh sides. grandson enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: The little one loved it. It was not the best quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: The little one loved it. It was not the best quality and has come apart at the seams after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball pit as a playroom for a litter of Papillon puppies. They loved it! The ball pit pops up easily and folds down to a very small size.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L

customer_reviews.title: and fits nicely in the corner of her room
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a breeze. I bought 200 balls to fill it, and it filled the floor of it; but I think another 200 would make it ideal for depth for my daughter to immerse herself in. It pops right open, and fits nicely in the corner of her room.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Murrah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pure Crap! Will be returning this flimsy thing asap. Hated giving this product 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: karen dalton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time. it is exactly as it shows on the picture. My 2 years old daughter loved it so much. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! It has held up to so much torment ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! It has held up to so much torment from our daughter. She has dragged this tent, jumped Into it and bomb dived on it! The mesh sides are also a great design feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great for tots
customer_reviews.text: Filled the tent with about 200 balls, it provides hours of fun for my little one and her cousins.
customer_reviews.author: R.A

customer_reviews.title: Happy and plays for quite awhile
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a 1 year old. Happy and plays for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Fun for lots of ages
customer_reviews.text: All three of my girls (6, 3, 1) all play in this ball tent. Great fun for lots of ages!
customer_reviews.author: J. Musser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really loves this little play house when they come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love that this tent hold in balls (not included)! It was an excellent purchase for the price, and a fun addition to my game room!
customer_reviews.author: Kelde81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Holds lots of balls. Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rusovick

customer_reviews.title: Great for playtime.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I love it for my 15 month old. Nothing he can get hurt with. Easy set up and easy to store anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: he loved it, but it needs about 2 to 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old grandson, he loved it, but it needs about 2 to 3 hundred balls to fill properly, it's bigger than it shows in the picture.

product_meta.title: EocuSun Ball Pit Play Tent,Kids Tents/Pop Up Play Tent Play Tents House Indoor and Outdoor Children Kid Tent Beach Tent Playhouse Zipper Storage Case for Boys Girls Toddler
feature_bullets: ➤Happy Hour :Kids will be drawn to this brightly colored polka dot theme ball pit play tent and love crawling through the doors. Fill tent with child’s favorite toys and keep child entertained for hours.

➤User-friendly Design:Size:35" x 34" x 38"; Plenty of room to play! Features fabric doors for keeping balls inside ball pit. Doors feature a tie back option for keeping it rolled up when desired.Perfect 2 large mesh windows design for childs visibility, keep the air fresh and you can look after your kid.

➤Durable & Safe & Easy to Clean:Made with durable fabric that wipes clean for a long life of fun and entertainment. Perfect for indoor and outdoor play.Our large play house is free of harmful chemicals & safe for use by children including toddlers and little ones. 100% non-toxic.

➤Easy to Setup & Fold Down :This pop-up tent is very easy to setup, simply pop out all the sides of the playtent. Features a special twist storing option for flat folding and convenient zippered bag when not in use.

➤Perfect Gift:The perfect good idea for Birthday Parties, picnics, carnivals, and Sleepovers. This toddler gift toys is recommended for Birthday gifts and Christmas Gift for kids children toddlers.Best Gift for 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8 year old birthday boy or girl.
